dt-option.name: stateRestore.delete

type.description: True if deleting states is to be enabled, false if not.

dt-option.default: The default value for the `-init stateRestore.delete` option is `true` meaning that as standard deleting states will be enabled.
dt-option.description:
This option allows for the deletion of new states to be enabled or disabled.
As default the value is true, meaning that states can be deleted. If this option is set to false, then deletion will be disabled.
Take a look at [this example]([../extensions/StateRestore/examples/initialisation/noDeletion.html) to see this in action.
